name: Developer Test Level
description: Developer testing environment with sample towers and crystals demonstrating various multipliers

_documentation.purpose: Developer test level demonstrating all tower types and crystal mechanics

mapElements.autoAnchors: Pre-placed tower positions showcasing one of each tower type (alpha through kappa). The 'type' field in autoAnchors specifies which tower to place.
mapElements.crystals: Damage-to-Thero conversion crystals with various multipliers
mapElements.path: Simple horizontal path for enemy movement

crystalMultipliers.x5: Converts damage dealt to crystal into 5x Thero per hit
crystalMultipliers.x1e-9: Converts damage to extremely small Thero amounts (scientific notation test)
crystalMultipliers.x10: Converts damage into 10x Thero per hit
crystalMultipliers.x0.1: Converts damage into 0.1x Thero per hit

_documentation.usage: This level is for testing tower mechanics and crystal reward systems. Click the Auto-Lattice button to place all towers from autoAnchors. Crystals spawn automatically when the level loads.
